label: NE-SSEN
description: Z-Wave Extender for Smoke Detection Sensor

metadata.inclusion:
Push "Add/Remove Button" of this equipment for a short time.
Also, if this equipment is NOT Added to any network, it is enable to Add automatically when the battery is connected
metadata.exclusion: Push "Add/Remove Button" of this equipment for a short time
metadata.reset:
Push and hold "Add/Remove Button" for a few seconds more than 5 seconds.
Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
